"Dzin pa ye sen ngo a ɔsom bo; na owuda: "Eyiadze no kɔ ye sen aponto ase kɔ: osiandɛ ɔbra twa owu na ohia dɛ adasa dwendwen ho yie."
"Awerɛhow ye sen enyigye: osiandɛ dza ɔdze awerɛhow ba no ma osuahu."
"Enyansafo akoma wɔ eyiadze; na nkwasea akoma dze ɔwɔ enyigye fi mu."
"Enyansafo enyimka ne tsie ye sen dɛ nyimpa betsie nkwasea hɔn adwontow."
"Na mbrɛ nsoɛ dɛw turuturu wɔ kutu ase no
"#Mbɛ 22.1": dɛmara so na ɔkwasea ne serew tse: dede gyan a; iyi so egyangyandze a."

"Dzin pa ye sen ngo a ɔsom bo; na owuda: "Ampaara apempensi ma onyansafo dan kwasea; na mboabagye fura enyiwa."
"Adze n'ewiei ye sen n'ahyɛse: na sunsum mu abotarnyi no
"Mma mmpɛ ntsɛm wɔ wo sunsum mu mmfa ebufuw: na ebufuw tse nkwasea hɔn akoko mu."
"Mma woara ennka dɛ
"#Mbɛ 22.1": Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na nkan no nda no oye sen iyinom yi? Osiandɛ nyansa biara nnyi dɛm asɛmbisa yi mu?"

"Dzin pa ye sen ngo a ɔsom bo; na owuda: "Nyansa ye dɛ egyapadze ara so: nyew
"#Mbɛ 22.1": oye dodow ma hɔn a wohu ewia."

"Dzin pa ye sen ngo a ɔsom bo; na owuda: "Na nyansa yɛ akoban
"#Mbɛ 22.1": dɛ mbrɛ sika so yɛ akoban: na nyimdzee n'abɔso nye yi
column4: dɛ nyansa kora nyia ɔwɔ no no nkwa."

"Dzin pa ye sen ngo a ɔsom bo; na owuda: "Dwendwen Nyankopɔn n'edwuma ho: na woana botum atsentsen dza ɔakyeakyea no no?"
"Eyiedzi da mu
column5: dwendwen: mpo Nyankopɔn ayɛ iyi afam ɔno ho
column6: amma nyimpa biara ennhu n'ekyir biribiara a ɔbɛba."

"Dzin pa ye sen ngo a ɔsom bo; na owuda: "Iyinom nyinara mehu wɔ m'egyangyandze nda no mu: ɔtseneneenyi wɔ hɔ a ne ndzeyɛtsenenee nyina mu no
"#Mbɛ 22.1": wotwa no kyen nna omumuyɛfo bi so wɔ hɔ a n'emumuyɛ nyina ekyir no

"Dzin pa ye sen ngo a ɔsom bo; na owuda: "Mma nnyɛ woho tseneneenyi nntra do; eso mma nnyɛ onyansafo nntra do: ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na ebɛsɛɛ woara woho?"
"Mma nnyɛ omumuyɛfo nntra do
"#Mbɛ 22.1": eso mma nnyɛ kwasea. Ɔyɛ dɛn na ibotwar wo mber ano ewu?"

"Dzin pa ye sen ngo a ɔsom bo; na owuda: "Oye dɛ ibosuo iyiara mu; nyew
column4: mma nnyi wo nsa mmfi ho: na nyia osuro Nyankopɔn no

"Dzin pa ye sen ngo a ɔsom bo; na owuda: "Nyansa yɛ ahoɔdzen ma onyansafo sen kuropɔn mu ahemfo du."
"Ampaara
"#Mbɛ 22.1": ɔtseneneenyi nnyi asaase do a ɔyɛ papa na ɔnnyɛ bɔn."

"Dzin pa ye sen ngo a ɔsom bo; na owuda: "Eso mma mmfa nsɛm a wɔkeka nyinara nnyɛ asɛm; amma anntse dɛ w'akowaa rodom wo:"
"na wankasa w'akoma so hu no mpɛn pii dɛ ɔwoara so adom binom dɛmara."
"Iyinom nyinara medze nyansa mosɔe hwɛe: mesee dɛ
"#Mbɛ 22.1": mubohu nyansa; na ɔno so ɔnye me ntamu waree."

"Dzin pa ye sen ngo a ɔsom bo; na owuda: "Dza ɔwɔ hɔ yi
column4: na ɔyɛ dɔnkuronn: woana botum ehu?"

"Dzin pa ye sen ngo a ɔsom bo; na owuda: "Medaan moho
"#Mbɛ 22.1": na musuaa m'akoma mu dɛ mubohu na mapɛnsapɛnsa
column4: na mahwehwɛ nyansa na ndzɛmba ase
column5: na mehu dɛ emumuyɛ yɛ nkwaseadze

"Dzin pa ye sen ngo a ɔsom bo; na owuda: "na mehu adze a ɔyɛ wenwen sen owu
column5: na ne nsa tse dɛ mpokyerɛ: nyia ɔsɔ Nyankopɔn enyi no
column6: obefi ne nsa efi; na ɔdzebɔnyɛnyi dze

"Dzin pa ye sen ngo a ɔsom bo; na owuda: "Hwɛ
column5: ɔdze adze kor so reka ho

"Dzin pa ye sen ngo a ɔsom bo; na owuda: "ɔno na me kra da ho hwehwɛ
"#Mbɛ 22.1": naaso munnhunii: ɔbarimba baako na mehu no wɔ apem mu; na ɔbaa dze

"Dzin pa ye sen ngo a ɔsom bo; na owuda: "Hwɛ
"#Mbɛ 22.1": iyiara nko na mehu dɛ Nyankopɔn bɔɔ dasanyi tɔɔtsenn; na hɔnara na wɔakɔhwehwɛ tsirmu nhyehyɛɛ pii."
